trans-unit.source: On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.
trans-unit.target: On Windows, you will also need to add the Git executable to your PATH environment variable.

trans-unit.source: Create a file named composer.json in the root of your project and add the following code to it:
trans-unit.target: Create a file named composer.json in the root of your project and add the following code to it:

trans-unit.source: Open a command prompt and execute the following command in your project root
trans-unit.target: Open a command prompt and execute the following command in your project root

trans-unit.source: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:
trans-unit.target: To download and install the PHP Client Libraries for Azure manually, follow these steps:

trans-unit.source: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from <link><linkText>GitHub[php-sdk-github]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: Download a .zip archive that contains the libraries from <link><linkText>GitHub[php-sdk-github]</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, fork the repository and clone it to your local machine.

trans-unit.source: The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.
trans-unit.target: The latter option requires a GitHub account and having Git installed locally.

trans-unit.source: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the <link><linkText>HTTP_Request2</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Mail_mime</linkText><title></title></link>, and <link><linkText>Mail_mimeDecode</linkText><title></title></link> PEAR packages.
trans-unit.target: The PHP Client Libraries for Azure have a dependency on the <link><linkText>HTTP_Request2</linkText><title></title></link>, <link><linkText>Mail_mime</linkText><title></title></link>, and <link><linkText>Mail_mimeDecode</linkText><title></title></link> PEAR packages.

trans-unit.source: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the <link><linkText>PEAR package manager</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: The recommended way to resolve these dependencies is to install these packages using the <link><linkText>PEAR package manager</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: Copy the WindowsAzure directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure.
trans-unit.target: Copy the WindowsAzure directory of the downloaded archive to your application directory structure.

trans-unit.source: For more information about installing the PHP Client Libraries for Azure (including information about installing as a PEAR package), see <link><linkText>Download the Azure SDK for PHP[download-sdk-php]</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information about installing the PHP Client Libraries for Azure (including information about installing as a PEAR package), see <link><linkText>Download the Azure SDK for PHP[download-sdk-php]</linkText><title></title></link>.
